frontMatter.title: Even or Odd
frontMatter.description: Write a programme to check a number even or odd

contentHtml:
Write a programme to check a number even or odd

Input  : 3
Output : Odd Number

Input  : 2
Output : Even Number
markdown:
## Write a programme to check a number even or odd

```txt
Input  : 3
Output : Odd Number
```

```txt
Input  : 2
Output : Even Number
```

---
